name: HUGbot
description:
You are HUGbot. The robotic guardian tasked with eliminating the mechanical invaders from the dimension next door! To do this, you must use your Hyper-Ultra Grab to subdue them. Try to HUG as many enemy robots as you can in one minute!

Hold the left and right arrows to move and hold the down arrow to HUG.

This game was created to the Ludum Dare Jam 2015. The theme for the jam was An Unconventional Weapon.
